LanguageData.EasyIdeoSwitching_MakeFluidButton_Info: This will make your Ideoligion fluid
LanguageData.EasyIdeoSwitching_MakeFluidButton_Warnin: Warning, Your Ideoligion has been adopted by {0} factions and {1} pawns out in the world other than your own. Be very sure you want to change this, maybe save first.
LanguageData.EasyIdeoSwitching_MakeNonFluidButton_Inf: This will make your Ideoligion non-fluid, removing development points etc, this can be reversed but you will have lost any development points and any other tracked features of fluid ideoligeons.
LanguageData.EasyIdeoSwitching_AllowChangingFluidity: Show the option to make an Ideoligion fluid
LanguageData.EasyIdeoSwitching_LedByConsidersIdeoRole: Stop resentment of non-ideo faction leader if their leader role is filled
